attributes.action: Ban disillusioned ISIS jihadists back into UK
attributes.additional_details: ISIS fighters must be allowed back into UK said ex M16 chief..definitely not....never....they betrayed the mouth that fed and clothed them so let them enjoy their "freedom of speech" there.....this is now the perfect time for the British government to start and take the stand and ban these people from re-entering the UK........if you choose to go and fight a cause that you supposedly believe in....then you should be there to the end...and if that means to death us do part...then so be it....YOUR CHOICE!!!!!!!! Please let our government finally see sense, activate the backbone of what this country once stood for and keep these lunatics out.....
